member.name: T:OnLineTest.Model.Authority
member.summary: 权限实例
权限实例

member.summary: int identity(1,1) primary key,-----权限ID

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityName
member.summary: nvarchar(20) not null,-----此项权限的中文名称

member.summary: int not null,-----此权限的深度(第一级定义为0)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityParentId
member.summary: int not null,-----此项权限的父编号(第一级的父编号为0)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityScore
member.summary: int not null,-----此项权限（动作）所对应的分值(可以为负值)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityHandlerPage
member.summary: varchar(50) not null,-----此项权限的处理页面

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityOrderNum
member.summary: int default 0,-------此项权限的排序号

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Authority.AuthorityRemark
member.summary: text not null,-----此项权限所的备注

member.summary: 试卷代码的备注 text null

member.summary: 真题对应的考试时间 datetime null

member.name: T:OnLineTest.Model.Question
member.summary: 试题实例

member.summary: 试题ID int identity(1,1) primary key

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.QuestionTitle
member.summary: 题目 text not null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.AnswerA
member.summary: 选项A text not null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.AnswerB
member.summary: 选项B text not null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.AnswerC
member.summary: 选项C text not null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.AnswerD
member.summary: 选项D text not null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.CorrectAnswer
member.summary: 参考答案 int not null check(CorrectAnswer in(1,2,3,4))

member.summary: 题目对应的图形(如果有) nvarchar(100) null

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.DifficultyId
member.summary: 外键,难度系数 int not null references Difficulty(DifficultyId)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.UserId
member.summary: 外键,上传此试题的用户 int not null references Users(UserId)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.UpLoadTime
member.summary: 上传的时间 datetime not null default getdate()

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.VerifyTimes
member.summary: 被审核的次数(三次以后进入终审) int not null default 0

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.IsVerified
member.summary: 是否审核通过标记,0为不通过,1为通过,只有通过审核以后,才将试题更新到审核后的状态,否则不更新 bit not null default 0

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.IsDelte
member.summary: 软删除标记 bit not null default 0

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.IsSupported
member.summary: 被赞次数 int not null default 0

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.IsDeSupported
member.summary: 被踩次数 int not null default 0

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.PaperCodeId
member.summary: 外键,题目所属的试卷代码ID int not null references PaperCodes(PaperCodeId)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.TextBookId
member.summary: 外键,题目对应的教材(因为一个试卷代码可以有多本教材) int null references TextBook(TextBookId)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.ChapterId
member.summary: 试题所对应的章节 int null references Chapter(ChapterId)

member.name: P:OnLineTest.Model.Question.PastExamPaperId
member.summary: 试题是否是历年真题,null表示不是真题 int null references PastExamPaper(PastExamPaperId)
